Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Delayed near Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line trains are standing near near Ashland/Lake due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line trains are standing near near Ashland/Lake due to track switching problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
